nextItem.title: JAQ Stack is Now a GitLab Supported Open Source Project ðŸ¦Š

blogPosts.content:
Weâ€™re thrilled to announce that **JAQ Stack** has been officially accepted into the [Docker-Sponsored Open Source (DSOS) Program](https://www.docker.com/community/open-source/)!  
This partnership recognizes JAQ Stack as a valuable open-source initiative supporting developers worldwide.

---

## ðŸŽ‰ What This Means

As part of the program, JAQ Stack now benefits from:

- âœ… **Free Docker Team Subscription** for the organization  
- ðŸ§© **Docker Scout** access for image insights and supply-chain security  
- âš™ï¸ **Free autobuilds** for automatic image publishing  
- ðŸš€ **Rate-limit removal** for all users pulling JAQ Stack public images  
- ðŸ·ï¸ **Official open-source badging** on Docker Hub (visible within two weeks)

All official JAQ Stack images can be found here:  
ðŸ‘‰ **[hub.docker.com/u/jaqstack](https://hub.docker.com/u/jaqstack)**

For ready-to-run examples:  
ðŸ“¦ **[jaqstack/jaqstack-examples](https://hub.docker.com/r/jaqstack/jaqstack-examples)**

---

## ðŸ’¡ Why It Matters

This sponsorship allows us to:

- Keep our **Helidon / Angular / SQL-NoSQL** containers freely available  
- Deliver **faster, more reliable builds** for the community  
- Enhance **security and transparency** through Docker Scout integration  
- Maintain **open, rate-limit-free access** for developers everywhere  

Itâ€™s another step toward our mission â€” **making full-stack development faster, simpler, and open for everyone.**

---

## ðŸ§­ Our Commitment

JAQ Stack will continue to embody its founding principles:

- ðŸ†“ **Open Source** â€” MIT-licensed and freely available  
- ðŸ¤ **Community-Driven** â€” guided by your ideas and contributions  
- ðŸ” **Transparent Development** â€” open discussions, roadmap, and feedback  

With Dockerâ€™s support, weâ€™re even better positioned to maintain consistent, reliable builds and grow our open-source ecosystem.

---

## ðŸ™Œ Thank You

This milestone wouldnâ€™t have been possible without the **community** â€” contributors, testers, and supporters whoâ€™ve believed in JAQ Stack since its early days.  
Your feedback and collaboration keep this project evolving.

If youâ€™d like to get involved:

- ðŸ§° [Contribute on GitHub](https://github.com/jaqstack/jaqstack)  
- ðŸ’¬ [Join the discussions](https://github.com/jaqstack/jaqstack/discussions)  
- ðŸŒ [Visit jaqstack.org](https://jaqstack.org)

---

## ðŸ³ About the Docker-Sponsored Open Source Program

The [Docker-Sponsored Open Source Program](https://www.docker.com/community/open-source/) supports projects that:

- Are **public and open source** under OSI-approved licenses  
- Are **actively maintained**  
- Have **no commercial pathway** (donations allowed)  
- Benefit the wider developer community  

Membership provides Docker Pro/Team features, rate-limit removal, and recognition on Docker Hub.  
JAQ Stackâ€™s inclusion highlights its growing impact in the open-source ecosystem.

---

> **â±ï¸ Build Fast. Scale Smart.**  
> Proudly part of the **Docker-Sponsored Open Source Program.**

---

prevItem.title: JAQ Stack is Now a Docker-Sponsored Open Source Project

blogPosts.content:
Weâ€™re proud to share that **JAQ Stack** has been officially approved as part of the **[GitLab Supported Open Source Program](https://about.gitlab.com/solutions/open-source/)**.  
This recognition reinforces our commitment to **open, transparent, and community-driven software development**.

---

## ðŸŽ‰ What This Means

As part of the program, JAQ Stack now receives **free access to GitLabâ€™s Ultimate Plan**, which includes:

- âœ… **GitLab Ultimate features** for advanced DevSecOps capabilities  
- ðŸ§© **Unlimited private & public repositories** under our organization  
- ðŸ§  **Integrated CI/CD pipelines** for automated testing and builds  
- ðŸ” **Built-in security, compliance, and vulnerability scanning**  
- ðŸ“ˆ **Project analytics and insights** for better collaboration  

JAQ Stack is also **officially listed on GitLabâ€™s open-source directory**, showcasing our contribution to the broader developer ecosystem:

ðŸ‘‰ [View JAQ Stack on GitLab](https://gitlab.com/explore/projects?name=jaqstack&archived=true)

---

## ðŸ’¡ Why It Matters

GitLabâ€™s sponsorship strengthens JAQ Stackâ€™s open-source mission by:

- Enabling **faster continuous integration** across our examples and templates  
- Improving **code quality and security** with GitLabâ€™s built-in analysis tools  
- Supporting a **scalable DevSecOps workflow** for contributors and maintainers  
- Ensuring **visibility and validation** within GitLabâ€™s open-source ecosystem  

Together with our existing **Docker-Sponsored Open Source** support, this expands JAQ Stackâ€™s open infrastructure for the community.

---

## ðŸ§­ Our Commitment

JAQ Stack continues to stand for:

- ðŸ†“ **Open Source** MIT-licensed and freely available  
- ðŸ¤ **Community-Driven** guided by your feedback and collaboration  
- ðŸ” **Transparent Development** every step visible, every decision open  

GitLabâ€™s support ensures we can maintain a secure, collaborative environment for developers building on top of JAQ Stack.

---

## ðŸ™Œ Thank You

Huge thanks to **GitLabâ€™s Open Source Program team** for recognizing JAQ Stack and for supporting open collaboration across the software ecosystem.  
We also want to thank our contributors â€” your efforts make programs like these possible.

If youâ€™d like to get involved:

- ðŸ§° [Contribute on GitHub](https://github.com/jaqstack/jaqstack)  
- ðŸ’¬ [Join the discussions](https://github.com/jaqstack/jaqstack/discussions)  
- ðŸŒ [Visit jaqstack.com](https://jaqstack.com)

---

## ðŸ¦Š About the GitLab Supported Open Source Program

The [GitLab Supported Open Source Program](https://about.gitlab.com/solutions/open-source/) provides **free access to GitLab Ultimate** for projects that:

- Are **publicly available** and open source under OSI-approved licenses  
- Are **actively maintained** and regularly updated  
- Provide **transparent contribution guidelines**  
- Do **not operate for commercial profit**

The program empowers open-source maintainers by giving them enterprise-grade DevSecOps capabilities to improve quality, security, and collaboration.

---

> **â±ï¸ Build Fast. Scale Smart.**  
> Proudly part of the **GitLab Supported Open Source Program.**

---

metadata.title: Welcome to JaqStack Website
metadata.description: Welcome to the JaqStack website! This is our first blog post.

prevItem.title: JAQ Stack is Now a GitLab Supported Open Source Project ðŸ¦Š

blogPosts.content:
Welcome to the JaqStack website! This is our first blog post.

<!-- truncate -->

## What is JaqStack?

JaqStack is a modern web development platform focused on building scalable and maintainable applications using the latest technologies.

## Our Mission

We're committed to:
- **Innovation**: Using cutting-edge technologies
- **Quality**: Delivering high-quality solutions
- **Community**: Building a strong developer community

## What's Next?

Stay tuned for more updates about our projects, tutorials, and insights into modern web development.

## Get Involved

We'd love to hear from you! Connect with us on:
- GitHub
- Twitter
- LinkedIn

Thanks for visiting, and welcome to the JaqStack community!
